multipleChoice.question: What are the two main goals of Omega Delta Phi?
options: Graduate its members and serve its communities
Promote social events and increase membership
Fundraise for charity and host cultural events
Enhance academic skills and provide career networking
multipleChoice.correct: Graduate its members and serve its communities

multipleChoice.question: When was Omega Delta Phi Fraternity founded?
What is the national public motto of Omega Delta Phi?
options: Crescit Eundo - It grows as it goes
multipleChoice.correct: Crescit Eundo - It grows as it goes

multipleChoice.question: Which of the following is NOT one of the Four Links of Omega Delta Phi?
What is the national slogan of Omega Delta Phi?
What are the official colors of Omega Delta Phi?
options: Scarlet and Silver, with Black as a supporting color
Blue and Gold, with White as a supporting color
Green and White, with Purple as a supporting color
Red and White, with Blue as a supporting color
multipleChoice.correct: Scarlet and Silver, with Black as a supporting color

fill.question: Name the founding fathers of Omega Delta Phi, one in each blank.
What are the values of Omega Delta Phi?

textbox.question: What is the purpose of ODPHI? (Commas aren't important)
textbox.answer: The purpose of this Brotherhood, a service/social fraternity dedicated to the needs and concerns of the community, shall be to promote and maintain the traditional values of Unity, Honesty, Integrity, and Leadership. This Brotherhood was founded in order to provide, to ANY man, a diverse fraternal experience, which coincides with a higher education.
